name: MLMediaObject
desc: The MLMediaObject class describes a single media file, such as a photo, song, or movie. Each media object contains basic metadata including a name, media type, URL, and so on. Additional information about each object is stored in its list of attributes. For a list of possible object attribute keys, see Media Object Attribute Keys.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: An identifier for the media object.

items.name: var mediaSourceIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier for the source that loaded the media object.

items.name: var mediaLibrary: MLMediaLibrary?
items.desc: A pointer to the media library instance that loaded the media object’s source.

items.name: var attributes: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of attributes describing the media object.

items.name: var mediaType: MLMediaType
items.desc: The media object’s type of media (image, audio, or movie).

items.name: var contentType: String?
items.desc: The UTI associated with the media object.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the media object.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The location of the media object.

items.name: var originalURL: URL?
items.desc: The location of the original media object, if url is not the original location.

items.name: var fileSize: Int
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the media object.

items.name: var modificationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time when the media object was last altered.

items.name: var thumbnailURL: URL?
items.desc: The location of the media object’s thumbnail image.

items.name: var artworkImage: NSImage?
items.desc: Album artwork associated with the media object.
